objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#1E2124'/><g opacity='0.1'><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='350' fill='none' stroke='#4F85E1' stroke-width='30'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='250' fill='none' stroke='#4F85E1' stroke-width='20'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='150' fill='none' stroke='#4F85E1' stroke-width='10'/></g><g><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='200' fill='url(#grad1)' opacity='0.7'/><rect x='0' y='880' width='1080' height='200' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.7'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><rect x='50' y='50' width='30' height='30' rx='5' fill='#4F85E1'/><rect x='50' y='90' width='30' height='30' rx='5' fill='#4F85E1'/><rect x='50' y='130' width='30' height='30' rx='5' fill='#4F85E1'/><rect x='90' y='50' width='30' height='30' rx='5' fill='#4F85E1'/><rect x='130' y='50' width='30' height='30' rx='5' fill='#4F85E1'/><rect x='1000' y='1000' width='30' height='30' rx='5' fill='#4F85E1'/><rect x='960' y='1000' width='30' height='30' rx='5' fill='#4F85E1'/><rect x='920' y='1000' width='30' height='30' rx='5' fill='#4F85E1'/><rect x='1000' y='960' width='30' height='30' rx='5' fill='#4F85E1'/><rect x='1000' y='920' width='30' height='30' rx='5' fill='#4F85E1'/></g><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#4F85E1;stop-opacity:0.5'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#1E2124;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='100%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#4F85E1;stop-opacity:0.5'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#1E2124;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs></svg>

objects.text: Logitech M590 Silent Multi-Device Wireless Mouse
Ultra-quiet clicking • Multi-device connectivity • Ergonomic design • 24-month battery life

product_details.name: Logitech M590 Silent Multi-Device Wireless Mouse - Ultimate Comfort & Productivity
product_details.description:
• Ultra-quiet clicking for distraction-free work environment
• Multi-device connectivity - Connect and switch between 3 devices seamlessly
• Advanced optical tracking for precise cursor control on most surfaces
• Ergonomic right-handed design for all-day comfort
• Long-lasting battery life up to 24 months
• Compact and portable design perfect for home, office, or travel
• Easy-switch technology with convenient numbered buttons (1-2-3)
• Logitech Flow enabled for cross-computer file sharing and control
• Durable build quality with premium matte finish
• Compatible with Windows, Mac, Chrome OS, and Linux

banner_details:
The banner presents a promotional design for a tech product, featuring a centrally placed product image ("product_image") framed by concentric circular strokes that draw attention to the center. At the top, a bold and impactful headline ("heading") conveys the main promotional offer, with a subheading ("tagline") in a vibrant blue for emphasis. The product name ("product_name") resides just below, clearly identifying the item in a clean, modern typeface. Informational features ("features") are listed in a concise line with separators. A supportive message ("subheading") in stylized font enhances appeal. The price ("price") is prominently displayed in blue. A distinct call-to-action rectangle ("cta_button") paired with inviting text ("cta_text") encourages immediate interaction. The background features gradient bars and subtle decorative boxes, enhancing visual hierarchy.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Charcoal: `#1E2124`
- Electric Blue: `#4F85E1`
- Soft White: `#FFFFFF`
- Light Gray: `#E0E0E0`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek Logitech mouse primarily in matte black, giving it a minimalist and professional aesthetic. The color palette includes deep charcoal (#1C1C1C), medium graphite gray (#2F2F2F), and subtle highlights of silver gray (#C0C0C0) on the scroll wheel and logo. The white (#FFFFFF) numbers and brand insignia offer stark contrast, enhancing visibility and brand identity. The darker tones blend smoothly across surfaces, providing depth without harsh separation. These colors work harmoniously to present a modern, tech-savvy impression. For advertisement banners, using a clean black-to-gray gradient background with white or silver typography ensures modern, focused messaging.
